name: paymentAuthorizationController(_:didSelectShippingMethod:completion:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method.DeprecatedUse paymentAuthorizationController(_:didSelectShippingMethod:handler:)  instead.

                     didSelectShippingMethod shippingMethod: PKShippingMethod,
